name: Tum Tum and the Evil Jellies (DEMO)
name_original: Tum Tum and the Evil Jellies (DEMO)
description:
Tum Tum is a lovely little witch in a mission to find her two witch friends, Blim Blim and Pom Pom, who have gone missing after some evil jellies mysteriously showed up and swallowed them.

This game is a mix of tactical and traditional RPGs. You can walk around the world and encounter jellies, and then fight them in a hexagonal battle grid.

The project is still in development and the version available here is a demo. It is recommended to download the desktop version as the graphics quality is better and the save files from the demo can be used in the future full version more easily.

Suggestions and bug reports are very welcome!
